Generic function to compact a table (publication formatting)

Source: R/compact.R
compact.Rd

Generic function to compact a table (publication formatting)

# S3 method for data.frame
compact(
  data,
  name_from,
  name_to = "variable",
  wrap_cols = NULL,
  rtn_flextable = FALSE,
  ...
)

# S3 method for crosstable
compact(data, name_from = c("label", ".id"), name_to = "variable", ...)

Arguments

data

the object to compact
name_from

name of the column to be collapsed when compacting
name_to

name of the column that will receive the collapsed column. Will be created if it doesn't exist.
wrap_cols

name of the columns to wrap
rtn_flextable

whether to return a formatted flextable() object or a simple data.frame
...

additional arguments (not used)

Value

a compacted data.frame

Examples

#dataframes
x=iris[c(1:5,51:55,101:105),]
compact(x, name_from="Species")

#>      variable Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width
#> 1      setosa                                                  
#> 2                      5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2
#> 3                      4.9           3          1.4         0.2
#> 4                      4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2
#> 5                      4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2
#> 6                        5         3.6          1.4         0.2
#> 7  versicolor                                                  
#> 8                        7         3.2          4.7         1.4
#> 9                      6.4         3.2          4.5         1.5
#> 10                     6.9         3.1          4.9         1.5
#> 11                     5.5         2.3            4         1.3
#> 12                     6.5         2.8          4.6         1.5
#> 13  virginica                                                  
#> 14                     6.3         3.3            6         2.5
#> 15                     5.8         2.7          5.1         1.9
#> 16                     7.1           3          5.9         2.1
#> 17                     6.3         2.9          5.6         1.8
#> 18                     6.5           3          5.8         2.2
compact(x, name_from="Species", name_to="Petal.Length")

#>    Petal.Length Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Width
#> 1        setosa                                     
#> 2           1.4          5.1         3.5         0.2
#> 3           1.4          4.9           3         0.2
#> 4           1.3          4.7         3.2         0.2
#> 5           1.5          4.6         3.1         0.2
#> 6           1.4            5         3.6         0.2
#> 7    versicolor                                     
#> 8           4.7            7         3.2         1.4
#> 9           4.5          6.4         3.2         1.5
#> 10          4.9          6.9         3.1         1.5
#> 11            4          5.5         2.3         1.3
#> 12          4.6          6.5         2.8         1.5
#> 13    virginica                                     
#> 14            6          6.3         3.3         2.5
#> 15          5.1          5.8         2.7         1.9
#> 16          5.9          7.1           3         2.1
#> 17          5.6          6.3         2.9         1.8
#> 18          5.8          6.5           3         2.2

#crosstables
x=crosstable(mtcars2, c(disp,hp,am), by=vs, test=TRUE, effect=TRUE)
compact(x)

#>                 variable           straight             vshaped
#> 1  Displacement (cu.in.)                                       
#> 2              Min / Max       71.1 / 258.0       120.3 / 472.0
#> 3              Med [IQR] 120.5 [83.0;162.4] 311.0 [275.8;360.0]
#> 4             Mean (std)       132.5 (56.9)       307.1 (106.8)
#> 5                 N (NA)             14 (0)              18 (0)
#> 6       Gross horsepower

#> 8              Med [IQR]  96.0 [66.0;109.8] 180.0 [156.2;226.2]
